title: Rainy night city driving, moderate speed, no significant braking
caption: The ego vehicle drives down a rainy city street at moderate speed, with no significant braking.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNight). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.2 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars driving in the same direction. The traffic lights are mostly green, and there are a few pedestrians walking on the sidewalk. The weather is dark and rainy, with visibility slightly reduced.
reasoning: The ego vehicle maintains a moderate speed to ensure safety on the wet road. It keeps a safe distance from the other cars and adjusts its speed when approaching traffic lights. The driver is cautious and attentive to the pedestrians and potential obstacles on the road.
